channel.title: Carl and Marcy Cook on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Carl and Marcy Cook on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – December 30, 2018
item.description: Church, Lesa stayed home to pack for trip. Got home, ate lunch, loaded truck, and headed to French Lick Springs Villas courtesy of the Cook’s. Sonja watching dogs for us. Okay place, kids excited. Ate Mexican, stopped by Jay Cs, Jet tub and log in the fireplace. Big day tomorrow!

item.title: Status Update – December 29, 2018
item.description: Seems like kids fought all day. Lesa did eggs for “Devil” eggs, I took out three bags trash. Christmas at my mom and dad’s in Indy, kids had lots of fun playing with cousins. Yahtzee with kids, then by ourselves after kids’ bedtime. Marcy Cook texted about a villa in French Lick.

item.title: Status Update – November 11, 2018
item.description: No one even said “Hi” when I got up, missed Ashley’s greeting. Church. Ashley home, had fun at Eleanor’s. Lesa and Ashley went shopping. Boys watched Incredibles 2 again. Ashley cooked a meatloaf supper (Lesa helped). I teased Ashley, her feelings were hurt, it ruined my evening.

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2018
item.description: Snowed. Slept in. YouTube videos. Hauled trash with boys. Lesa went to Rural King, boys played outside, I played Monopoly with Ashley. Tablets. Marcy Cook texted, 6 tickets to Stampede at Greene Co. Fairgrounds: dinner with Cooks, dancing, fun. Ashley spending night at Eleanor’s.

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2018
item.description: Church, Jr. Church with kids. Bloomfield Pool, free lunch and swimming courtesy Marcy Cook, Ashley hung with Eleanor until she left, too much sun for all, lots of fun. Watched movie to calm down before supper. Dillan at Gabe’s after supper. Yelled at Lesa and Ashley for fighting.

item.title: Status Update – March 31, 2015
item.description: Marcy Cook reads her new book about fostering at Greene County Eastern Library. She gives signed, personalized copies to Dillan and Ashley.
